reviews.review: Reward loop is nonexistent. Gameplay is perfect.

Hopefully you're not from NA otherwise you'll wait 7 min for a completely one sided and unfair match in VALVE's shiny new dogshit matchmaking system! Shame really, used to love this game. 

Go play VALORANT

Al principio es un hermoso juego, un shooter divertido, con mucho teamwork.
Pero todo cambia cuando de verdad queres jugar bien, tilteado siempre, equipos br o bots. Este juego me arruino la vida
da pra com os friends, seria dahora se eu tivesse
Es un buen juego, sinceramente recalca muy bien la realidad en un shoter, además dependeras no de la suerte si no se la habilidad.

Yani VALVE biraz daha çalışıp yıllardır bitiremediği hileyi bitirmeye çalışsa ve tamamen bitiremese bile yani mesela 10 oyundan 7-8'inde hile gelmese daha iyi olabilir. Sırf bu hile muhabbetinden ara vermiştik,geri geldik ve yine aynı şeyler. Bilmiyorum yani ne yapılabilir. Ama eskimeyen tek oyun CsGo'dur bizim için. Ty VALVE

Tato hra mě natolik baví že jsem si rozjebal stůl. Rankovací systém je taky uplně v pořádku že z 12 výher za sebou ne rankneš ale když dáš 2 prohry za sebou tak derankněš. Tím pádem hru 100% doporučuji

Nfts from 2008, just what i needed.

Each and every time I attempt to play this game, the community within it literally makes me lose my faith in humanity. Even in my first few matches of competitive where I'm trying to learn the basics of how to improve, all I've witnessed are people acting like cunŧs and it's very distracting within a "team-based shooter."

So instead of trying to put up with folks who have to act tough online because they're oppressed in reality, I'm just going to conserve my brain cells and simply walk away. If you want a PVP shooter where the community isn't as terrible, check out Insurgency instead.
